description.en:
"TBC Mart Token now Known as The Mart Token (TMT)  is the Official Cryptocurrency of the Global Online Shopping App Called The Mart App owned by Fudmart Technology Resources, a Registered Business in Nigeria. The Mart App brings the Cryptocurrency Community close to Adoption by Offering Services such Paying for Airtime and Data Recharge, Cable Subscription, Electric Bills etc to more than 21 different countries.

TMT is used for paying for these Services along side Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Bitcoin Cash (BCH) etc. TMT can also be used Shopping for Fashion Accessories, Smartphones, Consumer Electronic etc from its  Merchants anywhere in the World."
